pages.text: $(li)The Gazelle Horn can be used to upgrade a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/swiftness)Potion of Swiftness$(/l) II into Swiftness III in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/gazelle)Gazelles$(/l) may drop this item on death.
